item_prototype.name: ERD New Version Released for node {#NODENAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Elrond node version on {#NODENAME} is outdated

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Elrond Node:erd.node_status[erd_app_version,{#NODEIP},{#NODEPORT},{$NSEXP}].diff(0)}<>0 and {Template App Elrond Node:erd.node_status[erd_app_version,{#NODEIP},{#NODEPORT},{$NSEXP}].last(#1)}<>0 and {Template App Elrond Node:erd.node_status[erd_app_version,{#NODEIP},{#NODEPORT},{$NSEXP}].last(#2)}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Elrond node version was changed on {#NODENAME}
Elrond node {#NODENAME} peer type is waiting
Leader success percentage is low on Elrond node {#NODENAME}
Low nonce increase on Elrond node {#NODENAME}
